mapper.select:
select
distinct
from M003BMNM
where (BMN_CD, HAKKO_DAY) in (select BMN_CD, MAX(HAKKO_DAY) from M003BMNM
group by BMN_CD) AND DELETE_FLG = '0'
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.select:
select count(*) from M003BMNM
where (BMN_CD, HAKKO_DAY) in (select BMN_CD, MAX(HAKKO_DAY) from M003BMNM
group by BMN_CD) AND DELETE_FLG = '0'
